question: Question: Recent data presented at the Hadron Collider Physics conference in Kyoto has some particle physicists fearing they will lose their jobs. For 10 points each: [10] That data from the LHC has shown that it is unlikely that certain particles predicted by this theory exist. It predicts that every fermion has a partner boson and vice versa.
